posts.postText:
Offender name?:Toroalbino
Which Server?:TTT
Offender's Steam ID?:STEAM_0:1:32056001
What the Offender did?:First round he crow barred an AFK down to 40 health. The next round he knifed his traitor buddy, then claimed that his traitor buddy had tried to kill him yet the damage logs clearly say he crow barred his T buddy first then knifed him. I then asked him to slay himself next round two times, which he did not because he was revenge RDM'd which I advised them not to do :\
Admins on?:Only in spirit :\
